creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Joe Brotherton
description: V-shaped tree with light patches of green moss highlighted with faint gold wash; delicate white blossoms on winding, weaving L branches; low green foliage with red berries behind tree at bottom
marks: Signature and Seal lower center: [ 雪佳筆 ] (Sekka hitsu)
title: Plum Blossoms
